name: GET WRECKED (LOVERDRIVE)
description:
Nobody knows what year it is.

After the nuclear holocaust, a new society arose. One built on violence and bloodlust.

Such world needs a fitting sport,  just as bloody and meaningless.

Welcome to GET WRECKED. A game, where you control a car and wreck shit with a wrecking ball.

Controls:

- WASD: movement
- Mouse 0: SMASH!
- R: restart
